version_description:
- Improvements in chat performance.
- New languages.
- Improve microphone management.

- Improvements in overall performance.
- App size reduction.

- Chat bug fixed.
- Matching algorithm slightly improvement.

- New warning for outdated versions
- Better chat performance
- Badge notifications added
- Translation errors fixed
- Reported users will have a cooldown
- Updated terms and conditions

Important update:

* New feature: you can receive calls as teacher for a specific language if you have good level despite not being native.
* Better control over users that claim to be native when they are not.
* New system to report users bad behavior after a call ends.
* Detection mechanisms for users hanging calls for gender reasons.

Fix facebook login bug.

And overall improvement.
We’re excited to announce that we’ve given Lingbe a serious makeover! The new Lingbe is faster, sleeker, and has a new and improved interface.
Fixed some bugs that causes calls to drop off or do not hear the other person.

- Popular hours:
We've made it even easier to find a native speaker! Just check "Popular hours" before making a Native Call to see when most users are available.

- Refer a friend:
In the referral code section of your profile we explain how to refer a friend and get 200 lingos for each one.

- Activate single languages:
You have the option to activate and deactivate each language individually in Settings. The green "Available" button in Home then applies this preselection.

Introducing: lingbe Missions

A new quick and easy way to get lingos for free!
Complete as many challenges from the list as you like and earn free lingos for each one.
Find the new Missions-functionality in the Lingshop!

Introducing: lingbe Missions

A new quick and easy way to get lingos for free!
Complete as many challenges from the list as you like and earn free lingos for each one.
Find the new Missions-functionality in the Lingshop!

Improved Calls!
We've improved the call connection! This makes our calls faster and more stable, for an even better Lingbe experience.

Improved Calls!
We've improved the call connection! This makes our calls faster and more stable, for an even better Lingbe experience.
Fixed some bugs.

Fixed some bugs.

Popular hours in Practice Calls
At what times chances are best to find someone who practices the same languages as I do?
Check "popular hours" in calls to find out!

Missed Calls
Your friends may have called you, but you didn't hear! In Lingcalls you can now see the calls you missed from your friends. Take a look, you might want to call someone back ;)

Missed Calls
Your friends may have called you, but you didn't hear! In Lingcalls you can now see the calls you missed from your friends. Take a look, you might want to call someone back ;)

Unlock Rewards
Reaching higher levels pays off! Lingbe now unlocks rewards in Lingshop as you level up!
Our latest reward: change your avatar for your photo!

Unlock Rewards

Our latest reward: change your avatar for your photo!

Personalized Referral Codes
Your referral code has just become a lot easier to remember.

A faster Lingbe
We've been making many big and small changes in the guts of Lingbe lately to make your experience with Lingbe much faster and smoother!
We hope you'll enjoy the new Lingbe speed :)

New section: Lingbe Tasks
Ask and answer questions about your languages and get lingos!

New section: Lingbe Tasks
Ask and answer questions about your languages and get lingos!

New section: Lingbe Tasks
Ask and answer questions about your languages and get lingos!

Introducing Badges & Weekly Statistics!
Check our new badges in "Me" and find out how to unlock them!
You'll get a reward for each badge! :)
Also have a look at your weekly statistics in "Me" to keep track of your progress!

Introducing Badges & Weekly Statistics!
Check our new badges in "Me" and find out how to unlock them!
You'll get a reward for each badge! :)
Also have a look at your weekly statistics in "Me" to keep track of your progress!

Introducing Video Calls
Do you think it's easier to understand someone if you can see their face? So do we! That's why we now offer video calls for our Pro users.
See your friends and boost your language skills!

Introducing Video Calls
Do you think it's easier to understand someone if you can see their face? So do we! That's why we now offer video calls for our Pro users.
See your friends and boost your language skills!

Introducing Conversation Topics
Lingbe now provides you with suggestions for cool topics to talk about on the call screens - just in case you run out of ideas ;)

Introducing Conversation Topics
Lingbe now provides you with suggestions for cool topics to talk about on the call screens - just in case you run out of ideas ;)

Introducing Reply to answers
In LingbeTasks you can now reply to answers, which makes LingbeTasks even more interactive!
In addition, new questions now have a clearer design and more filter options :)

Introducing Reply to answers
In LingbeTasks you can now reply to answers, which makes LingbeTasks even more interactive!
In addition, new questions now have a clearer design and more filter options :)

Introducing Start a Streak.
Light the flame and make a call every day to keep it burning.
You'll receive a gift every third day of your streak!
And best of all: the longer your streak lasts, the bigger will be the gift!

Bug control
Among other improvements, in this update Lingbe
- has improved the call quality,
- made sure that the ads on the Lingshop work and
- removed some bugs in the chat function

Introducing Send a Greeting and better Chat
Did you like a user's profile? Send them a Greeting and let them know! Just press the waving hand in their profile and choose the best greeting! They will love it! :D
Also, we've increased the chat perfomance a lot!

Introducing Send a Greeting and better Chat
Did you like a user's profile? Send them a Greeting and let them know! Just press the waving hand in their profile and choose the best greeting! They will love it! :D
Also, we've increased the chat perfomance a lot!

Introducing Send messages in a Call
Do you sometimes have problems understanding the person you are talking to? Don't worry anymore! You can now open a chat within the call and send messages there while you are talking!
Also, we've increased the chat perfomance a lot!

Introducing LingbeRooms
LingbeRooms are group audio chats in live rooms! In each room you can talk to several users at the same time and practice your languages in group conversations :)
Cool extra: the host gets lingos for everyone who joins!

Introducing Schedule Lingbe Rooms
You can now organize Lingbe rooms in advance!
Just check which rooms are planned, sign up and make sure you don't miss any interesting discussion in your target languages!

Introducing Schedule Lingbe Rooms
You can now organize Lingbe rooms in advance!
Just check which rooms are planned, sign up and make sure you don't miss any interesting discussion in your target languages!

Practice Calls are more fun now
You can now invite your friends to join ongoing practice calls!
Get the most out of your calls and practice with multiple friends at once! :D

You can now invite your friends to join ongoing practice calls!

Fix a critical problem that cause the app not connect.
Fix a critical problem that cause the app not connect.

Introducing Speakers and Referrals
Do you want to use Lingbe in public? You can now turn the speakers on and off in Lingbe Rooms!
Also, you can now check the status of users you have referred to see if your reward is due yet! ;)

Introducing Speakers and Referrals
Do you want to use Lingbe in public? You can now turn the speakers on and off in Lingbe Rooms!
Also, you can now check the status of users you have referred to see if your reward is due yet! ;)

Introducing Better connection in Native Calls
We have improved the connection in our Native Calls to make the connection process faster and more stable! :)

Introducing Better connection in Native Calls
We have improved the connection in our Native Calls to make the connection process faster and more stable! :)
Fix some bugs
Fix some bugs

Introducing Topic suggestions in rooms
You have created a room and don't know what to talk about? No problem! Rooms now have suggested topics and titles!
Just go to \"Edit room\" and choose from the suggested topics to change the title of your room :)

Introducing Topic suggestions in rooms
You have created a room and don't know what to talk about? No problem! Rooms now have suggested topics and titles!
Just go to \"Edit room\" and choose from the suggested topics to change the title of your room :)

Introducing Free Lingbe Rooms for Pro users
If you are Pro, you no longer have to worry about lingos when you enter Lingbe Rooms!
Join any room for free and practice as long as you want without paying a single lingo! :D

Introducing italki Lesson Rooms
Here at Lingbe we're extremely excited to launch our first beta collaboration with italki!
The online language learning platform and to celebrate it, Professional Teachers will be offering some lessons on Lingbe.
Keep an eye out for our new Lesson Rooms!

Introducing Native Rooms
We set up a new type of room: Native Rooms!
From now on you can see at first glance if the admin of a room is a native speaker and select interesting rooms more easily!
